title.rendered: Refurbished phones are the way forward!

content.rendered:
Refurbished phones are the way forward! You’ll be able to save money on your everyday bills whilst enjoying modern technology. Our growing range will allow you to choose the mobile phones you love. We’ll even make sure it’s in great condition so you love it for years to come. 

 

What is a refurbished phone?

Essentially, a refurbished phone is a device that has been previously owned and sold on after use. We like to ensure that all refurbished phones we sell on are grade A condition. Even if in pristine condition, we aren’t able to sell these devices as brand new as they have already been opened and used. All in all, the only difference really is the price. 

Refurbished mobile phones don’t come with headphones. This is for hygiene reasons. We cannot guarantee that these haven’t been used before so they are removed before the phones are screened. There is no guarantee that you will receive any original accessories. This includes both a charging plug and the charging wire itself. 

 

Why choose a refurbished phone?

There are so many reasons as to why a refurbished phone is something you should get your hands on. One of the first is that they are so much cheaper! As they’ve been used, you can get them at an amazing price. Any phones that aren’t in the position to be resold are recycled. This means that you know you aren’t going to get a handset that is ruined. You can trust it’s going to be in a very high quality condition. 

Another amazing reason to purchase refurbished handsets is they make amazing first phones! Whether you’re buying your childs first phone or introducing your grandparents to new technology, refurbs are great! They’re affordable, they aren’t expensive to repair and they’re easy to use!

 

Apple iPhone 8 64GB Refurbished 

If you fancy getting your hands on the iPhone 8 64GB refurb, the best network to join is Talkmobile. You will only have to pay £19 each month for 10GB. This is an amazing price for this desirable handset. This deal also includes no upfront at all, meaning you’ve got nothing you need to pay today. Talkmobile is a brilliant network to get involved with. As soon as you confirm your order, you’ll get an instant credit check reply. This means there’s no waiting around for a manual credit check to be processed! Know if you’re getting a new phone right away.

 

Apple iPhone Xr 64GB Refurbished

For just £23 per month, you’re able to get your hands on the iPhone XR 64GB refurbished. This will get you 10GB of data on Talkmobile. For such a high specification handset, you’re going to want to make sure you get your hands on this amazing price. This deal includes just a £19.99 upfront cost, which brings the upfront cost down to this super affordable price. A huge perk of joining Talkmobile is that all of their deals include free tethering. You can make sure that your loved ones stay connected to the internet at no extra cost.

 

Apple iPhone 7 32GB Refurbished

Joining the Talkmobile network at just £19 per month will allow you to get your hands on the iPhone 7 refurbished! This is so cheap and super affordable! This deal includes 10GB of data every single month and comes with no upfront cost at all. We’ve even added £180 redemption cashback to this package to reduce the price even further. This is going to take the effective monthly cost down to just £11.50 per month!

 

Apple iPhone 8 Plus 64GB Refurbished

Another Talkmobile mobile phone deal you aren’t going to want to miss is the iPhone 8 Plus 64GB refurbished deal. You can get this amazing smartphone for just £30 per month. This will mean you get 30GB of data every single month. As Talkmobile runs off the Vodafone network, you’ll be able to experience the very best network speeds.  With an upfront cost of only £55.99, you’re getting the very best price available. 

 

Make sure you check out our full range of refurbished mobile phones if you want an amazing price. You’ll get a grade A smartphone with a great package. We’re giving you the chance to get the smartphones you desire whilst sticking to a budget.
